activities:
SysIQ may receive personal information during data migrations, or throughout the course of development work involving the creation or implementation of a new e-commerce software platform.  SysIQ does not retain such personal information for a prolonged period of time, but it may receive such information during the performance of services for customers.

SysIQ may also transmit employment/HR information from the EU into the United States via electronic mail or electronic direct delivery methods.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
